ACCOUNT_REFERENCE.TITLE: Account Reference Values
ACCOUNT_REFERENCE.DESCRIPTION: Show debit, credit and balance of the defined account group known as account references

AGED_CREDITORS.TITLE: Aged Creditors
AGED_CREDITORS.DESCRIPTION: This report displays all receivables owed to creditors by period.

AGED_DEBTORS.TITLE: Aged Debtors
AGED_DEBTORS.DESCRIPTION: This report show all the debts of the clients, while specifying the debts per period

ANALYSIS_AUX_CASHBOXES.TITLE: Analysis of Auxiliary Cashboxes
ANALYSIS_AUX_CASHBOXES.DESCRIPTION: This report makes it possible to track the monthly payments and disbursements of the auxiliary cashboxes

BALANCE_SHEET.TITLE: Balance Sheet
BALANCE_SHEET.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the balance sheet of the enterprise

CASHFLOW_BY_SERVICE.TITLE: Cash flow By Service
CASHFLOW_BY_SERVICE.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the changes in the accounts and revenues of the balance sheet on cash by Services

CASHFLOW.TITLE: Cash Flow Physical Report
CASHFLOW.DESCRIPTION: This report shows changes in the accounts and revenues of the balance sheet on cash

CLIENTS.TITLE: Annual Clients Report
CLIENTS.DESCRIPTION: This report displays all the debtor groups, their account balances at the beginning of the fiscal year, the debits and credits to their accounts, and their ending balances.
CLIENTS.HIDE_LOCKED_CLIENTS_HELP_TEXT: Selecting yes will filter out all locked clients from the report.  By default, the value is no.
CLIENTS.INCLUDE_CASH_CLIENTS_HELP_TEXT: Selecting this option will add in cash debtor groups.  By default only non-cash clients (conventions) are queried.

COMPARE_INVOICED_RECEIVED.DESCRIPTION: This report makes it possible to attach the items billed to a patient on the articulated items consumed or distributed to the Patient
COMPARE_INVOICED_RECEIVED.TITLE: Compare invoiced items to received stock

EMPLOYEE_STANDING.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the financial situation of an employee
EMPLOYEE_STANDING.TITLE: Employee Standing Report

REPORT.PROFIT_AND_LOSS_BY_MONTH: Profit and Loss Statement By Month
REPORT.PROFIT_AND_LOSS_BY_YEAR: Profit and Loss Statement By Fiscal Year

MONTHLY_BALANCE.DESCRIPTION: This report is used to analyze the balance of accounts on a monthly basis. This analysis shows the total debits and credits as well as the total balances for each account.
MONTHLY_BALANCE.TITLE: Monthly Balance

SYSTEM_USAGE_STAT.TITLE: System Usage Statistics
SYSTEM_USAGE_STAT.DESCRIPTION: This report  produce, for a given period, stats of, Total of patients recorded by hour of the day, Total of invoices made by hour of the day and total of cash payments made by hour of the day

OPEN_DEBTORS.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the debtors that have a standing debt with the institution, and gives some control over the sort order.  For advanced analysis, the report can add in the last invoice date and last payment date, as well as limit the scope of the search by a date.
OPEN_DEBTORS.TITLE: Debtors with Unpaid Debts
OPEN_DEBTORS.DATE_LIMIT_HELP: The date limit will only scan records from this date to the present.
OPEN_DEBTORS.SHOW_DETAILED_VIEW: Include Columns for Last Dates of Invoicing and Payment
OPEN_DEBTORS.SHOW_DETAILED_VIEW_HELP: Enable to include the last date the debtor paid and the last date they were invoiced.  This is useful for understanding when they were at the institution.  However, it will make the query take slightly longer.
OPEN_DEBTORS.SHOW_UNVERIFIED_TRANSACTIONS_HELP: Enable to include records from the Journal which have not been audited by the accountant as well as records from the General Ledger the accountant has verified.  This view must be treated as a projection until the accountant has approved the Journal transactions and moved them to the General Ledger.

DEBTOR_SUMMARY.TITLE: Debtors summary report
DEBTOR_SUMMARY.DESCRIPTION: This report details the amount to paid in every inventory group for an invoice during a period, for a specific debor group

INVENTORY_CHANGE.TITLE: Inventory Changes Report
INVENTORY_CHANGE.DESCRIPTION: This reports shows changes occured on inventory items during a period.

MONTHLY_CONSUMPTION.TITLE: Monthly consumption
MONTHLY_CONSUMPTION.DESCRIPTION: Monthly consumption report by deposit for a given period

PATIENT_STANDING.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the financial situation of a patient
PATIENT_STANDING.INCLUDE_STOCK_MOVEMENTS: Include stock movements distributed to the patient
PATIENT_STANDING.TITLE: Patient Standing Report

PURCHASE_ORDER_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the difference between what we purchase with what we have entered in the stock.
PURCHASE_ORDER_ANALYSIS.TITLE: Purchase Order Analysis

STOCK_VALUE.TITLE: Stock value report
STOCK_VALUE.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the current stock value for each inventory in a depot
STOCK_VALUE.EXCLUDE_INVENTORIES_ZERO_VALUE: Exclude inventories with zero stock value

STOCK_EXPIRATION_REPORT.TITLE: Stock Expiration Report
STOCK_EXPIRATION_REPORT.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the lots that are currently in stock and are also expired or will expire prior to being consummed.

STOCK_CONSUMPTION_GRAPH_REPORT.TITLE: Stock Consumption's graph report
STOCK_CONSUMPTION_GRAPH_REPORT.DESCRIPTION: This report graphically shows the consumption of stock during a period for a depot or inventory

REPORT_ACCOUNTS.TITLE: Account Report
REPORT_ACCOUNTS.DESCRIPTION: This report shows all transactions for an individual account given a set time period.
REPORT_ACCOUNTS.WARN_MULTIPLE: N.B. This report concerns an income/expense account and spans multiple fiscal years. Income/expense accounts are cleared to 0 at the beginning of every fiscal year. The cumulative balance displayed is for the transactions within this period of time. It is recommended to use this statement within a single fiscal year.
REPORT_ACCOUNTS.WARN_CURRENCY: Attention! You are using a currency other than the enterprise currency.  Values on this report are subject to change with changes to the exchange rate and should not be considered final.  Please save a report in the enterprise currency for long term reference.

PROFIT_AND_LOSS_BY_MONTH_REPORT.TITLE: Profit and Loss Statement (Monthly)
PROFIT_AND_LOSS_BY_MONTH_REPORT.DESCRIPTION: Creates a Profit and Loss Statement for the current and the two previous periods.

PROFIT_AND_LOSS_BY_YEAR_REPORT.TITLE: Profit and Loss Statement (Yearly)
PROFIT_AND_LOSS_BY_YEAR_REPORT.DESCRIPTION: Creates a Profit and Loss Statement for the current and the two previous fiscal years.

REPORT_ACCOUNTS_MULTIPLE.TITLE: Multiple Accounts Report
REPORT_ACCOUNTS_MULTIPLE.DESCRIPTION: This report shows all transactions for a group of accounts given a set time period.

REPORT_INDICATORS.TITLE: Indicators Report
REPORT_INDICATORS.DESCRIPTION: This report summarizes the indicators for a hospital

PROFIT_AND_LOSS_REPORT.TITLE: Income Expense Report
PROFIT_AND_LOSS_REPORT.DESCRIPTION: Show the list of incomes and expenses that occurred inside the enterprise

BALANCE_REPORT.TITLE: Balance Report
BALANCE_REPORT.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the account balance for a given period

REPORT_PROFIT_AND_LOSS.TITLE: Income Expense Report
REPORT_PROFIT_AND_LOSS.DESCRIPTION: This report shows all incomes and expenses of the enterprise

CASH_REPORT.TITLE: Cash Report
CASH_REPORT.DESCRIPTION: This report shows all cash entries and exits inside the enterprise

UNPAID_INVOICE_PAYMENTS_REPORT.TITLE: Unpaid Invoices Report
UNPAID_INVOICE_PAYMENTS_REPORT.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the balance of invoices which are not completely paid or overpaid during a period.

STOCK.TITLE: Articles in Stock Report
STOCK.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the stock of products, their average monthly consumption and indicates if a reorder is needed.  The items are ordered by inventory group, then by their name.  By default, all products in every depot is displayed, but these can be filtered by specifying an individual product or depot.
STOCK.INVENTORY_REPORT_DESCRIPTION: This report shows all movements of a product and its stock status and value.
STOCK.EXIT_REPORT_DESCRIPTION: This report shows stock exits which had occurred in different depots
STOCK.INCLUDE_GROUPED_SERVICE_EXIT: Include stock exit grouped by services
STOCK.INCLUDE_DEPOT_EXIT: Include stock exit to other depots
STOCK.ENTRY_REPORT_DESCRIPTION: This report displays the different stock entries that took place in depots

UTIL.EMAIL_HELP_TXT: The above email will receive the report as an attachment.  The server must have an internet connection for the email to be successfully delivered.

OPTIONS.HIDE_TITLE_ACCOUNT_HELP: If yes, the report will not contain title accounts
OPTIONS.USE_ORIGINAL_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY_HELP: If yes, the report will show the recorded currency of the transaction instead of the value in the enterprise currency.
OPTIONS.TOTALS_CURRENCY_HELP: This options lets you view the totals in the selected currency by exchanging the totals into the selected currency using today's exchange rate.
OPTIONS.SEPARATE_DEBITS_AND_CREDITS_HELP: This option breaks out columns from a single positive or negative balance into two columns representing debits and credits.
OPTIONS.REMOVE_ZERO_ROWS_HELP: This option will remove rows that do not have any data in them.  Produces a more compact output.
OPTIONS.INCLUDE_CLOSING_BALANCES_HELP: This option will force the balance sheet to show the entire year's balances, including the closing balances.  Any operations made to close income and expense accounts will be reflected in the balance sheet.
OPTIONS.INCLUDE_UNPOSTED_RECORDS_HELP: This option will force the report to include unposted values in the dataset.  Unposted values should never be included in a final report as they have not been validated by an accountant.
OPTIONS.SHOW_DEBTS_DETAILS_HELP: This options allow to have name of each member of a debtor group with their debt
OPTIONS.SHOW_EMPLOYEE_SUPPORT: Show patient debts supported by employees
OPTIONS.SHOW_EMPLOYEE_SUPPORT_HELP: This option makes it possible to see the support provided by employees
OPTIONS.SHOW_OTHER_SUPPORT: Show patient debts supported by organizations
OPTIONS.SHOW_OTHER_SUPPORT_HELP: This option allows you to see the support provided by organizations that are not employees
OPTIONS.SHOW_DETAILS_HELP: This option allows you to see more details
OPTIONS.SHOW_REMAINING_DETAILS_HELP: This option allows to see the details on remaining debts
OPTIONS.SHOW_PAID_DETAILS_HELP: This option allows you to view payment details
OPTIONS.SHOW_INVOICED_DETAILS_HELP: This option allows to see the details on the invoices

OHADA.BALANCE_SHEET_DESCRIPTION: This report shows the balance sheet of the enterprise according the OHADA standard

REF_DESCRIPTION.AF: Brevets, licences, logiciels et droits similaires
REF_DESCRIPTION.AP: Avances et acomptes versés sur immobilisations
REF_DESCRIPTION.BS: Banques, chèques postaux, caisses et assimilés
REF_DESCRIPTION.CD: Primes d'apport, d'émission et de fusion
REF_DESCRIPTION.CI: Résultat net de l'exercice (bénéfice + ou perte -)
REF_DESCRIPTION.CP: Total capitaux propres et ressources assimilées
REF_DESCRIPTION.DB: Dettes de crédit-bail et contrats assimilés
REF_DESCRIPTION.DF: Total dettes financières et ressources assimilées
REF_DESCRIPTION.DN: Provisions pour risques à court terme
REF_DESCRIPTION.DR: Banques, établissements financières et crédits de trésorerie
REF_DESCRIPTION.TL: Reprises de provisions et de dépreciations financières
REF_DESCRIPTION.RC: Achat de matières premières et fournitures liées
REF_DESCRIPTION.RD: Variation de stocks de matières premières et fournitures liées
REF_DESCRIPTION.RL: Dotations aux amortissements, aux provisions et dépréciation
REF_DESCRIPTION.XB: CHIFFRE D'AFFAIRE ( A + B + C + D )
REF_DESCRIPTION.XC: VALEUR AJOUTEE (XB + RA + RB) + (somme TE à RJ)
REF_DESCRIPTION.XH: RESULTAT HORS ACTIVITES ORDINAIRES (somme TN à RP)
REF_DESCRIPTION.RN: Dotations aux provisions et aux dépréciations financières

CLIENT_SUMMARY.TITLE: Clients Debts Report
CLIENT_SUMMARY.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the debts of the various members of a debtor group

CLIENT_SUPPORT.TITLE: Clients Support Report
CLIENT_SUPPORT.DESCRIPTION: This report shows supported patients and the supporter

REALIZED_PROFIT.TITLE: Collection on invoices report
REALIZED_PROFIT.DESCRIPTION: This report shows incomes made from invoices with remaining debts

RECOVERY_CAPACITY.TITLE: Recovery Capacity Report
RECOVERY_CAPACITY.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the recovery capacity of the institution on a daily basis

STOCK_CHANGES.TITLE: Stock Changes Report
STOCK_CHANGES.DESCRIPTION: This report allows you to record changes to the stock of a depot by comparing the amount in the system to the amount found on the shelves.
